thread.title: Duke's Travel Plaza has Amenities for The Whole Family
thread.title_full: Duke's Travel Plaza has Amenities for The Whole Family

author: prbuzz.com
title: Duke's Travel Plaza has Amenities for The Whole Family
text:
Duke's Travel Plaza travel amenities even include the family dog, so that your furry friend can take a break from the boring drive and go for a run.
Many people who travel in the car with their dogs can understand that these active friends of theirs get bored and need to release a lot of energy. If you are stopping at Duke's Travel Plaza, then along with all the other offers of the location (including a Knife Shop, Gas Station, Food, Gifts, and More) you can let your dog run. This is a new offering at the location and intends to help out people on the road who are concerned with providing the ample amount of activity for their dogs.
Dogs often are like young children, and if they aren't given something constructive to do with their energy, such as exercise, they can become restless and release their energy in ways that may not be optimal in the confines of a car. Luckily Dukes Travel Plaza has a solution to this. When you stop in to buy gas, food, or gifts, the dog can exercise, providing you with a more comfortable remainder of your trip, and the guarantee that your family member got much needed time outdoors.
About Duke's Travel Plaza:
Duke's Travel Plaza is a truck stop and shopping center. Located at 21620 Interstate 20
(exit 253) Canton, Texas 75103, the travel plaza has multiple storefronts for the traveling
driver. These services include The Knife Shop, a dog park, Shell gas station, Stuckey's, Canton Truck & Automotive, a Western Gift Shop, Shorepower Technologies, Showers, and a Beef Jerky Outlet.
About Click4Corp:
Click4Corp is a growing professional Internet web hosting and design firm that provides quality business solutions designed for small and medium-sized organizations. They provide services that utilize up to date internet technology to create new business opportunities for their clients. They are dedicated to guiding clients through the decision making process for what best meets their objectives. Click4Corp was established in 1999 and is currently located at 400 Chisholm Pl #406 Plano, TX 75075. Their Website is located at http://www.click4corp.com/.
